Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
MIME element (text/plain) 
*/Sent by email/* 
 
  
 
29 January 2007                                                          
                                          File No:  Q/2227 
 
 RORY JAMES MCMAHON 
ABN: 99 960 765 570 
Carbon Fibre Technologies 
 
295 Rocky Passage Rd 
Redlands, QLD 4165 
0438 556 999 
mmcc3@tpg.com.au 
 
  
 
Dear Sir/Madam, 
 
* * 
 
*Reference to Unauthorised Copyrighted Motion Pictures on Website* 
 
*Sites: attached schedule* 
 
  
 
The Australian Federation Against Copyright Theft (AFACT), is associated  
with the Motion Picture Association (MPA). 
 
  
 
The following companies are members of the MPA 
 
  
 
BUENA VISTA INTERNATIONAL INC 
 
PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION 
 
SONY PICTURES RELEASING INTERNATIONAL CORPORATION 
 
TWENTIETH CENTURY FOX INTERNATIONAL CORPORATION 
 
UNIVERSAL INTERNATIONAL FILMS INC 
 
WARNER BROS. PICTURES INTERNATIONAL [A DIVISION OF WARNER BROS. PICTURES  
INC] 
 
  
 
AFACT acts on behalf of the following Australian Producers and/or  
Distributors of cinematograph films: 
 
  
 
ROADSHOW FILMS PTY LTD 
 
UNIVERSAL PICTURES (AUSTRALASIA) PTY LTD 
 
PARAMOUNT HOME ENTERTAINMENT (AUSTRALASIA) PTY LTD 
 
COLUMBIA TRISTAR HOME ENTERTAINMENT PTY LTD 
 
TWENTIETH CENTURY FOX HOME ENTERTAINMENT SOUTH PACIFIC PTY LTD 
 
BUENA VISTA HOME ENTERTAINMENT (AUSTRALIA) PTY LTD 
 
WARNER HOME VIDEO PTY LTD 
 
MGM HOME ENTERTAINMENT GROUP (AUSTRALASIA) PTY LTD 
 
ROADSHOW ENTERTAINMENT PTY LTD 
 
  
 
We have received information that you are providing references to  
copyright material, downloadable media specified in the below schedule  
on your website: http://carbonfibre.com.au/tracker2/index.php  
<http://www.divxcrawler.com/> 
 
                                                                                           
          
 
  
 
The distribution, sale or offering for sale of unauthorised copies of  
copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the  
/Copyright Act 1968/. 
 
  
 
Please take all appropriate steps to cause the immediate cessation any  
references to unauthorised copies of copyrighted motion pictures. 
 
  
 
We warrant on behalf of the copyright owners and we believe in good faith:
